author: abcoathup
content:
I assume that the process for assigning EIP/ERC #s is still manual by EIP editors?
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6506#issuecomment-1432288507

I'd be happy to become an ERC editor just to get EIP/ERC #s assigned quickly (only if this was helpful), until this is automated.  
I am keen to avoid any perceived number gaming by ERC authors.  As an ERC author I had an ERC number changed due to number lunging (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/4888#issuecomment-1064757848), so have a strong appreciation for perceived value of numbers and transparency of the number assigning process.

I visit the EIP repo most week days, but work in the Australian time zone so wouldn't want to attend EIPIP meetings at their current time.

author: gcolvin
content: I thought the bot was going to do it.  Please, please, can the bot just do it?
